author: HNHH Staff
title: 23 Quotables From Drake's "More Life"
text:
Home > Music > 23 Quotables From Drake's "More Life" 23 Quotables From Drake's "More Life" 0 0 Posted by HNHH Staff , Mar 20, 2017 at 06:29pm Drizzy delivers some memorable lines throughout his new project. 
It didn't take long for Drake 's More Life playlist to inspire some incredible memes, and it seems inevitable that the next phase of the project's ever-presence will come in Instagram quotes of the many memorable lyrics. There are certainly a lot of instantly eyebrow-raising lines as well as a number of rewind-worthy subliminal disses, and we've done our best to collect some of the most memorable of the bunch.Check out the quotes below, and let us know your favorite lines in the comments section. I drunk text J-LoOld number, so it bounce backMama never used to cook much Used to chef KD Now me and Chef, KD Bet on shots for twenty G's Told me I'm lookin' exhausted You hit it right on the nose I'm tired of all of these n*ggas I'm tired of all of these hoes Flippin' the script like a read-through Yeah, all of my brothers, we equal I play my part too, like a sequel And get you gold, no spray tans I need you to stop runnin' back to your ex, he’s a wasteman She wanna get married tonight But I can't take a knee, 'cause I'm wearin' all whiteI switch flow like I switch time zone Can't get Nobu, but you can get Milestone's I'm never washed, but I'm not new I know I said top five, but I’m top two Yeah, my side girl got a 5S with the screen cracked Still hit me back right away, better not never hesitate Don't come around thinkin' you gettin' saved Fake fuck with me back then But it's gettin' hard for you to fake it now Fuck bein' rich when I'm forty, man, I'm tryna make it now Kendall turned 21, was up the street with 21 They could see me online, but they won't see me on the ones N*ggas see me in person First thing they say is, "I know you need a break." Hell naw, I feel great, ready now, why wait? Studio right in my yard I'm doin' ten in a week How long I been on this streak? Dream about work in my sleep 
Queen Street visions that nobody believed in If we not on the charts, my XO n*ggas eatin' Fifty-two consecutive weekends, shout out to Weeknd The city gets stronger when everybody is speakin' All you did was write the book on garbage-ass Rollies Ego strokin', picture postin' Claimin' that you'd do it for motivational purposes only But you just had to show me See, I know, 'cause I study you closely I know when someone lyin' I notice people standin' for nothin' and gettin' tired I know what we're both thinkin' even when you're quiet Goddamn, beef forever unfinished Yeah, it's all open ended, had me off for a minute Damn, I must be coachin', 'cause I'm not playin' with them Can you not see the difference? I mean, I keep the fuckin' lights on in the buildin' Man, my record deal should be 500 million, goddamn Y'all fuckin' hilarious Y'all really think you n*ggas teamin' up and scarin' us Y'all n*ggas is arrogant, y'all sleep at the Sheraton All that shit embarrassin' Tell your big homie I'm all for goin' there again He ain't even die and I ball with his inheritance 
I've been out in Bel-Air like Will was These streets got so familiar That must be why you move so icy Icy like 1017 Icy like there's nobody who'd ever need Better not give that all to anyone but me 
I don't want to have to go to funerals I gotta start sleepin' at the studio I don't have no time to be no Romeo All the love I need is at the rodeo All the love I need is here at OVOYeah, ducked a lot of spiteful movesI was an angry yute when I was writin' Views You overnight celebrity, you one day starSwear I Told You that I'm in this bitch for eternityI am a reflection of all of your insecuritiesBehind closed doors, a lot of 6 God worshipping < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 20, 2017 at 06:29pm 7 Views

I don't want to have to go to funerals I gotta start sleepin' at the studio I don't have no time to be no Romeo All the love I need is at the rodeo All the love I need is here at OVOYeah, ducked a lot of spiteful movesI was an angry yute when I was writin' Views You overnight celebrity, you one day starSwear I Told You that I'm in this bitch for eternityI am a reflection of all of your insecuritiesBehind closed doors, a lot of 6 God worshipping
